types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# {{lb|fr|computing}} [[colocation]]; A service allowing multiple [[customer]]s to locate [[network]], [[server]]{{,}} and storage gear, connect them to a variety of [[telecommunication]]s and network service providers, with a minimum of cost and complexity
types.html:
housing m (plural housings)

  1. (computing) colocation; A service allowing multiple customers to locate network, server, and storage gear, connect them to a variety of telecommunications and network service providers, with a minimum of cost and complexity
